title: Remake is pointless. Thanks anyways.
body: So if someone is afk for the first 3 minutes of a game you cant remake. What the fuck is the point of that then ? I just lost LP because of an afk. Surprise riot cant get something right

replies.body: It isnt for an AFKer. Its for someone that disconnected.
And of course riot fanboys down vote it. God forbid they fix a problem

> [{quoted}](name=GreenWitEnvee,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RzBJ7Qzt,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-13T02:56:00.132+0000)
>
> And of course riot fanboys down vote it. God forbid they fix a problem

Explain how it doesnt work because its saved me a good few times since it has been implemented. And Im by no means a "riot fan boy"

I'll use my game as an example. Our adc was connected, never moved from fountain or bought items. Cant remake if someone is afk. He never once moved during the entire game. Why would you not add a remake option for that ? if 4 out of 5 ppl type remake obviously something is wrong other than a dc
I had an adc that dc'd at 1 minute, no one died and we tried to remake at 5 mins. Didn't work.

That must be a 1 off - If you do not move out of the fountain it will disconnect you.

regardless - you report him for AFK and he will get a nasty ban later
In my experience, as long as they connect, you can't remake.  I've had multiple matches where someone connect, then dc 30 seconds later or afk the rest of the match, and remake isn't available.
